Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Chris Kovach "Amra_Lion"
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle from Walmart(where it was originally offered) for my wife for Christmas, and it works awesome, yeah it not as detailed as the higher mega pixel cameras , but for the price of $99 it is an awesome set. The printer will go anywhere and print right from the camera no PC needed. My wife took a trip right after Christmas and took  her set with her. She was printing and taking pictures of the family and of the kids for the family to have the whole time. It is exceptionally user friendly, there is even some basic editing options built into the camera. If your looking for a Very Good Quality camera printer set , you cannot go wrong with this one for the money. 5 Megapixels isn't as high as most cameras out there but it makes incredibly detailed 3x5 or 4x6 photos

Reviews.Title: Perfect for vacation, scrapbooking, and home!
Reviews.Author: Nester "Corinne"
Reviews.Content: I got this is a gift and have used it so much more than I even expected!  The quality of both the camera and photos are so good and it's so easy to grab and go!

HP's intuitive-to-use Photosmart M447 Digital Camera? Get ready to snap away with impressive results, courtesy of the 5-megapixel resolution and 5x digital zoom. This model also has Steady Photo, an antishake feature that helps eliminate motion blur, and a bright, 2.4" display for framing and reviewing shots.
